contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Infobox album | Name = Year of the Dragon | Type = studio | Artist = [[Modern Talking]] | Cover = year_of_the_dragon.jpg | Released = February 28, 2000 | Recorded = [[Hansa Records|Hansa]] | Genre = [[Eurodance]], [[Rock (music)|Rock]] | Length = | Label = [[BMG]] International | Producer = [[Dieter Bohlen]] | Last album = ''[[Alone (Modern Talking album)|Alone]]''<br> (1999) | This album = '''''Year of the Dragon''''' <br> (2000) | Next album = ''[[America (Modern Talking album)|America]]''<br> (2001) }} '''''Year of the Dragon''''' is the ninth studio album released by the [[Germany|German]] europop duo [[Modern Talking]]. It was released on 28 February 2000 through [[Hansa Records]] and distributed by [[BMG]]. ''Year of the Dragon'' enter the German album chart at No. 3 on 13 March 2000 and spent two weeks in the top-5,<ref name="CHARTS-DEUTSCHLAND Album Top 100 (March 13, 2000)">{{Cite web |url=http://www.charts.de/charts.asp?cat=a&country=de&year=2000&date=20000313&x=17&y=12|title=CHARTS-DEUTSCHLAND Album Top 100 (March 13, 2000)|publisher=charts.de|accessdate=2011-02-16|language=German}}</ref> it spent total of 18 weeks on the album chart and eventually went platinum shipping over 300,000 units in Germany.<ref>{{Cite web |url=http://www.musicline.de/de/chartverfolgung_summary/artist/Modern+Talking/17619/?type=longplay|title=Musicline.de: Modern Talking (albums)|publisher=Musicline.de|work=[[Media Control Charts|Media Control]]|accessdate=2012-07-28|language=German}}</ref>{{Certification Cite Ref|region=Germany|title=2000 -
